description.en:
I found out that my friend is a vampire. Would you believe me? My friend for 15 years, Kim Hyung Woo, got drunk and was brought to my house. Then he started blabbering ridiculous things like, he’s a vampire, and since he just bit me, I might become a vampire, too…  


---
